Key Match Events: Orbelin Pineda scored the first goal for Mexico in the 5th minute
Cesar Huerta scored the second goal for Mexico in the 53rd minute
Luis Romo scored the third goal for Mexico in the 57th minute
Miscellaneous Highlights: The match took place at the Rose Bowl
Without Guillermo Ochoa, Edson Álvarez, Raúl Jiménez or Hirving “Chucky” Lozano on the roster
Others: New Zealand's defence managed to keep Mexico tame despite El Tri dominating the match with 13 shots to two
Santiago Gimenez had another night to forget for the national side as his goal drought continued
